description.value:
You were born with a layer of scales across your entire body that resemble those of your draconic progenitor. When you're unarmored, the scales give you a +2 item bonus to AC with a Dexterity cap of +3. The item bonus to AC from these scales is cumulative with armor potency runes on your explorer's clothing, the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mystic Armor] spell, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Bands of Force].

Special You can select this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain into or out of this feat.
